synopsis.text: Department's misfits, the Modern Crime Prevention Headquarters. His new partner, Haru Katou, a detective with a strong sense of justice and compassion, finds Daisuke's materialistic approach to crime-solving repulsive. As polar opposites, they must find a way to work together to solve the most complex crimes, challenging their personal beliefs and testing their partnership. Will their contrasting values prove to be a strength or a weakness in the face of unsolvable mysteries? Join Daisuke and Haru as they navigate the world of crime and wealth in "The Millionaire Detective: Balance Unlimited."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
